snippet.title: Tim Duncan beast on court, if not in press
snippet.description:
* OK, readers, let's have a debate, one of sports talk's favorites. Who is the best player in the NBA? Is it Kevin Durant, LeBron James or Kobe Bryant?
http://www.cnn.com/2013/05/31/us/spurs-tim-duncan-profile/index.html

snippet.title: Kobe Bryant Fast Facts
snippet.description:

http://www.cnn.com/2013/04/29/us/kobe-bryant-fast-facts/index.html

snippet.title: Una lesión en el tendón pone en riesgo la carrera de Kobe Bryant
snippet.description:
* (CNN) — El basquetbolista Kobe Bryant, líder de los Lakers de Los Ángeles, abandonó el partido de este viernes por la noche con una lesión en la pierna que podría ser una rotura del tendón de Aquiles. Bryant se realizará una resonancia magnética este...
http://cnnespanol.cnn.com/2013/04/13/una-lesion-en-el-tendon-pone-en-riesgo-la-carrera-de-kobe-bryant/

snippet.title: Kobe Bryant tears Achilles, sidelined for months
snippet.description:
* Los Angeles Lakers star Kobe Bryant could be sidelined for up to nine months after tearing his Achilles tendon, the team said Saturday.
http://www.cnn.com/2013/04/13/sport/kobe-bryant-injury/index.html

snippet.title: Kobe Bryant, wife say they are calling off divorce
snippet.description:
* Los Angeles Lakers star Kobe Bryant and his wife, Vanessa, say they are calling off their divorce.
http://www.cnn.com/2013/01/12/sport/kobe-divorce-off/index.html

snippet.title: San Antonio Spurs poised to win 5th NBA crown, but ... yawn?
snippet.description:
* LeBron James is cocky. Kobe Bryant is a ball hog. Kevin Garnett is a thug. Dwight Howard got his coach fired. And Metta World Peace? Ugh, Metta World Peace.
http://www.cnn.com/2012/05/25/us/san-antonio-spurs-ambivalence/index.html

snippet.title: Los Lakers quedaron eliminados de los "play-off" de la NBA
snippet.description:
* No hubo Kobe Bryant que valiera para salvar a los Lakers de la eliminación en las semifinales de la Conferencia Oeste, tras perder frente a los Thunders de Oklahoma por 106-90 la noche anterior. En el quinto y definitivo partido los Thunder le...
http://cnnespanol.cnn.com/2012/05/22/los-lakers-quedaron-eliminados-de-los-play-off-de-la-nba/
